thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 17 of 585
thread.title: Tina Webb
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Tina Webb

author: Tina Webb
title: Tina Webb
text: From the moment we walked into public storage we were treated with the upmost respect. It felt like a nice change going from a snooty environment to a friendly and respectful environment this company has created. The people are nice and friendly and really put all their effort into finding what the customer wants and not once tried to sell me something that I didn't want. Overall I highly recommend that if you are looking for a storage with reasonable prices and full of great employees, "public storage" is the place to go!
